items.value: Something went wrong... Maybe it's time to try other games.
You got it! But it was just pure luck.
Congratulations, you guessed twice! Now try again, but this time, get it right.
We'll just pretend you tried really hard.
Are you really sure you want to achieve this?
You're lucky. But it doesn't matter because you still won't be able to get the final achievement.
Wow, you guessed eight times! But we still won't give you a cake.
You're one step away from incredible glory! But don't forget that luck can abandon you at any moment.
Oh, you're a real lucky one! But don't celebrate just yet, as there are plenty of other games that will show you otherwise.
All for the sake of an achievement... Right?
We just hope it's not your fifth attempt.
A random button press generator would do better.
Seems like it's not your day. Maybe try guessing which answer will be incorrect?,
Halfway to success, just remember the same amount again.
It's hard to memorize, we understand.
You're probably starting to feel like a winner, aren't you?
Just two more, and the day won't be wasted.
Incredible! You managed to guess all the answers! Perhaps you should consider a career in games of chance. Well, on second thought, maybe not.
